name: Ping (itch) (Liven)
description:
• Single player.
  • Cooperative / Competitive Local two players.
  • Tweakable experience.
  • 7 Challenges (3 Single - 2 coop - 2  VS) + 1 Chronicle.   
  • Web version
  • Downladable version (use itch.io app for updates)
    • Optimized
    • Saves
    • English / French Langages

 

 

Find  The  Green  Square. 

By finding more, you'll unlock the variants and other challenges. 

The variants will extend possibilities to shape your own rules thereby allow you to find your feel good way to play.

Essentially, the game aims to provide a relaxing / challenging experience depending on how you choose to modify and play it.

   

 

 

  • Keyboard  :   Arrows  or / and  WASD    (or ZQSD)
  • GamePad  advised.
  • Mouse

 

 

 

I need feedback to know if the game provide some fun (or some kind of feel good) and if it worth developing it. 

If so, I have a lot of ideas for new challenges, variants and even more fonctionnalities.

Today, only the first single player challenge is some what polished, the others and  the chronicle are early exemples of what can be done with this concept.    

 

 

I hope you'll enjoy, see you in comments...
